start.speaker: Noma
start.text:
This ledger contains memories. Not mine. Not yours. Borrowed.

If we keep it, we owe something. If we burn it, we lose something.

choices.text: Keep it. We can carry the debt.
Burn it. Some knowledge isn’t worth the cost.

end.speaker: Narrator
end.text: The Hollow City doesn’t like being remembered. You feel it tighten around the decision.
